content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Plate Production Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (1.0, 1.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (3.0, 1.0)

These furnaces are used for smelting copper ore into copper plates. Currently, they are out of fuel and have copper ore loaded in them.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors in Crafting Copper Cables
- Ensure that you have the required copper plates before attempting to craft copper cables. Copper plates need to be smelted in a furnace from copper ore. Make sure the furnaces are fueled and operational to produce copper plates.

### Errors when Furnaces are Out of Fuel
- Regularly check the fuel status of your furnaces. Ensure they are adequately supplied with coal or another fuel source to maintain continuous operation.
